name: Mission: Descend
description:
A procedural game about finding alien technology in the depths of a planet.

You have been sent to another planet in a mission to collect pieces of alien technology that were discovered recently. These pieces are in the depths of the planet, where you can't breath and you won't have time to eat, so you make use of energy tanks. Go explore and come back to the space ship before you run out of energy to recover it and continue exploring the next day. 

CONTROLS:

  • A-D/Arrow Keys to move
  • W/Up arrow to jump
  • W/Up arrow next to a wall to climb (Press multiple times)
  • B to use bomb
  • N to release energy tank
  • Run into bombs and tanks to collect them
  • Find the piece of alien technology to win
  • Return to the space ship to recover your energy.
